titles.title: Bipartisan Task Force for Responsible Fiscal Action Act of 2007
A bill to establish a Bipartisan Task Force for Responsible Fiscal Action, to assure the economic security of the United States, and to expand future prosperity and growth for all Americans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11662-11664, S11664-11665, S11665)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Budget.
Committee on the Budget. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 110-221.

bill.summary:
9/18/2007--Introduced.
Bipartisan Task Force for Responsible Fiscal Action Act of 2007 - Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to establish the Bipartisan Task Force for Responsible Fiscal Action to address, and report to the President and Congress on, the nation's long-term fiscal imbalances, including those attributable to the Medicare and Social Security programs and the gap between their projected revenues and expenditures.
Provides for expedited legislative consideration of Task Force recommendations.
